data.title: Virgin Road (Hamasaki Ayumi)
data.text:
Artist

Hamasaki Ayumi

Song

Virgin Road

Lyrics

Hamasaki Ayumi

Music

Komuro Tetsuya

Other Information

Arrangement: Nakano Yuta

Programming & Strings Arrangement: Nakano Yuta

Drums: Vinnie Colaiuta

Guitar: Akizuki Ryota

Strings: Charlie Bisharat Strings

Mixed by David Reitzas

Live Performances

[2010.04.11~10.11] ayumi hamasaki ARENA TOUR 2010 A ~Rock'n'Roll Circus~

[2010.12.24] 61st Kohaku Uta Gassen

[2010.12.30~31] ayumi hamasaki COUNTDOWN LIVE 2010-2011 ~do it again~

[2017.05.13~07.17] ayumi hamasaki Just the beginning -20- TOUR 2017

Music Video

The music video for "Virgin Road" was directed by Muto Masashi and was shot in Los Angeles. It features actor and model Manuel Schwarz. It's considered to be Hamasaki's fifth-most expensive music video.

It features Hamasaki and Schwarz getting married. After that, they are seen robbing a bank and gas station. A police chase ensues, and Hamasaki throws the stolen money out of the car. Resting somewhere on the hill, helicopter throw grenades at the couple, but they escape.

Disambiguation

The following are the different versions of this song released throughout Hamasaki Ayumi's discography, listed chronologically.

Virgin Road

Found on the "L" single as track #1 and on the Love songs album as track #15. This is the standard version of the song, also referred to as "Original mix".

Virgin Road (Original mix -Instrumental-)

Found on the "L" single as track #5. This is the standard version without the main vocals.

Virgin Road (FPM EVERLUST mix)

Found on the ayu-mi-x 7 -version HOUSE- remix album as track #13. This is a remix by FPM.

Virgin Road [Chopin: Amadare no Prelude]

Found on the LOVE CLASSICS album as track #6. This is a mash-up between the original song and Frédéric Chopin's "Raindrop Prelude".
